Class CoreFileUtils

java.lang.Object
org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreFileUtils
public class CoreFileUtils extends Object
Utility-class that invokes standard JDK utilities, but wraps IOException into IllegalStateException and creates missing parent directories.

    static void
    copyFile(File sourceFile, File targetFile)
    Copy the file sourceFile to the file targetFile and creates all missing parent directories if necessary.
    static String
    loadFileContent(File fileToLoad)
    Loading the content of file as String (it's better to use for text-files only) and returning null if the content of file could not be loaded for any reason.

    The same as loadFileContent(File), but accept the path to that file as String
    static boolean
    removePathSilent(Path pathToRemove)
    The same as Files.deleteIfExists(Path), but ignore any kind of IOException.

    Recursively removes either a single file or the whole directory and returns the number of removed items

  • Method Details

    • loadFileContent

      public static String loadFileContent(String pathToLoadStr)
      The same as loadFileContent(File), but accept the path to that file as String
      Parameters:
      pathToLoadStr - the path of file to laod as String
      Returns:
      the content of that file as String or null if it's impossible to do

    • loadFileContent

      public static String loadFileContent(File fileToLoad)
      Loading the content of file as String (it's better to use for text-files only) and returning null if the content of file could not be loaded for any reason.
      Parameters:
      fileToLoad - file to read the content
      Returns:
      the content of file as String or null if it's impossible to do

    • saveFileContent

      public static void saveFileContent(File fileToSave, String fileContent)
      Saving the content into the file fileToSave (if the file is not empty - it will be truncated). All missing parent directories will be created if necessary.
      Parameters:
      fileToSave - the file to save into
      fileContent - the content to be saved
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - in case of something goes wrong (which must not really happen)

    • copyFile

      public static void copyFile(File sourceFile, File targetFile)
      Copy the file sourceFile to the file targetFile and creates all missing parent directories if necessary.

    • removePathSilent

      public static boolean removePathSilent(Path pathToRemove)
      The same as Files.deleteIfExists(Path), but ignore any kind of IOException.
      Note: For non-empty directory the method removeSilent(File) should be used, because this method will always return false for non-empty directory and remove nothing.
      Parameters:
      pathToRemove - the path to either a file or an empty directory to remove
      Returns:
      true if the item (file or empty directory) is removed, or false otherwise

    • removeSilent

      public static int removeSilent(File fileOrDirToRemove)
      Recursively removes either a single file or the whole directory and returns the number of removed items
      Parameters:
      fileOrDirToRemove - path to either a file or a directory to remove recursively
      Returns:
      the number of removed items
